OOC: What's the exactly the thing that the Mouthpieced does???

Aelo/celeno/Ocipite:

Aelo avoided the Zardus's attack and fired 2 feather missiles against 
Zardus. She knew that something happened with one of her 
sisters, 'cause she felt pain in her back; she looked  a Ocipite who 
was fightting agaisnt Wheeljack and Hurricane and after that looked 
that Mosquitor was  slaming his mouthpieced into her back, making a 
lot pain in Celeno. Pain that Aelo and Ocipite share.

"Let my sister alone... Insect!!!!!"shouted anger Aelo while she 
fired 25 energy balls against Mosquitor. Aelo recived 3 WheelJack's 
shot but she ignore them, but Hurricane's lightning bolts stun her... 
She was fightting now to recover and survive.

Celeno knew that she was figthing for her live; she and her sisters 
had the power to absorb enemies' energy with her hand and she started 
to absorb Mosquitor's energy.

Ocipite dodged most of the Wheeljack's attacks and few shots hit her 
in her leg. But she avoided the Hurricane's lightning and said "Come 
on you can do it better!!!"

She fired 15 energy balls against Wheeljack and 10 against Hurrican



> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::Wheeljack got hit by half the shots.  he fired 12 shots at Aelo 
and 12 at 
> Ocipite::
> ~~~~~
> ::Hurricane dodged most of the shots, but a few grazed him.  he 
fired 2 
> lightning bolts at Aelo and 2 at Ocipite::
